document_data.name: Nickel
document_data.mainbody: '''Nickel''' was a non-precious metal found in the [[Realms]], used for a variety of purposes.
document_data.Properties: Pure nickel weighed {{SI|555|pound|k|long=yes}} per {{SI|1|cubic foot||long=yes}}.{{Cite dragon/13/How Heavy Is My Giant|6}} Prior to the [[Time of Troubles]], nickel required a significant amount of progress on a [[psionicist]]'s part before it could be synthesized through ''[[molecular rearrangement]]''.

Usages.Spell Components:
* ''[[Binding]]'' used chains of nickel to affect creatures from [[Hades]].{{Cite dragon/68/From the Sorcerer's Scroll|58}}
* ''[[Liquid earth]]'' used a valuable bent nickel tube.

document_data.Creatures: * [[Nalg]]s were immune to damage from mundane physical weapons, except from those made of nickel or a nickel alloy.{{Cite dragon/86/Familiars with a special use|20}}
document_data.History:
* The [[demon lord]] [[Kostchtchie]] wielded a huge [[cold iron]] [[hammer]] inlaid with nickel and silver.
* The [[archdevil]] [[Geryon]] carried a magical [[horn]] bound with [[brass]] bands and pins of nickel.<ref>{{Cite dragon/91/Nine Hells revisited|26}}
document_data.Other: * Planetoid shards (the destroyed fragments of planets in [[Wildspace]]) often had a sharp end made of nickel or iron.<ref>{{Cite dragon/160/Up, Away, and Beyond|38}}
